poem:
**Algorithmic Shadows**

In the glow of screens,  
children wade through a pixelated stream,  
innocence navigating wires  
woven with unseen threads.  
A parliament whispers  
of power unseen—  
the right to mute  
their guiding ghost.  
Yet, in youthful eyes,  
algorithms still cast  
shadows untold;  
dreams entangled,  
unfolding in digital twilight.
